text: I m glad that all of you exist  at least there are people out there like me I m at the end of my rope  I ve become too sick to work  Physically I don t qualify for disability because I m not disabled   months out of the year  I used to love my job  but my condition worsened and I just couldn t do it anymore Some days I can t even read multiple paragraphs  and my spine renders me unable to work consistently  My family doesn t care  it s mostly their fault that I am this fucked up to begin with  Years of malnutrition and neglect left me with multiple problems that have ruined any chance for a future When I did work  my cluster headaches made me unable to function normally  so my coworkers spread rumors that I was slow  or that I m drug addict  My bad back worsened  and I could no longer walk for more than a mile  so I quit  My job was damaging my already damaged body So here I am  unable to work  yet unqualified for any assistance  I was depressed before because of how much harder I had to work just to appear normal  now all that I feel is hopelessness I think I ll wait a few more weeks  then I ll probably end my life  Maybe things will get better I hope no one ever has to suffer like me
summary: At the end of his rope, he has become too sick to work. He doesn't qualify for disability because he's not disabled months out of the year. He used to love his job but his condition worsened and he couldn't do it anymore. His family doesn't care.
cleaned: end rope sick work not qualify disability not disabled month year love job condition worsen not anymore family not care

text: Maybe you think I wouldn t miss anything if I killed myself But I will  Whenever I have a good day once  I think about how I ll miss having that kind of fun  I ll miss my friends and how I won t be able to spend more time with them  I ll miss leaving my family behind  never being able to watch my little brother grow up  I ll miss all the times when I really loved my family and the moments where I didn t think about the pain I ll experience when they ll eventually leave me  I ll miss the feeling of finding a song that speaks to me  I ll miss the sunrise and sunsets that I used to study through  I ll miss the Friday nights and Saturday mornings when I felt like I didn t give a care in the world   I ve been trying so hard to put my feelings into words  and although life scares the hell out of me  sometimes I do really want to hold on if I can feel happy forever  If I didn t have to think about the inevitable things that I didn t want  or go through another heartbreak  maybe I d want to stay  I feel like my existence in this world is too long  and I d rather be here temporarily to have the best time instead of trapped with all the emotions I must endure
summary: Sometimes I think about killing myself. I would rather be here temporarily to have the best time than be trapped with all the emotions I must endure in this world. I miss my friends, family and studying.    If I didn't have to think about the inevitable things that I didnâ€™t want or go through another heartbreak maybe I would want to stay.
cleaned: think kill temporarily good time trap emotion endure world miss friend family study not think inevitable thing not want heartbreak maybe want stay

text: I don t want to be resilient anymore  I m tired of being strongEvery  Single  Day  I wake up and feel horribly depressed  Nothing has happened yet  and I already want to kill myself  I look on this sub and the depression sub to maybe find some comfort in seeing how not alone I am in all of this  Every morning   I see all these posts about  keep being strong  and  being resiliant  and stuff  It s a nice message to send  but it doesn t resonate with me  Oddly enough  the ones that DO resonate are the ones that are stuff like  things will get better  Which  from what I hear  is damaging to say for someone who is suicidal  It s unrealistic to say that things are   going to get better  I get that  But I don t want realism  I want that stupid fantasy of me living the life I always dreamed of  The simple  quiet life ive always wanted  Not one of wealth  power  and extravagance  Just one where I m just happy and content with being alive  I know what I m saying is childish and stupid  But  that s what I feel  I just want someone in my life to hold me and let me know how amazing life is  because I clearly cannot see it  Someone to catch my tears and explain to me how wonderful and serene it is to experience all the joys life has to offer   All I want is some god damn hope  okay  I ve been  resilient  and  strong  for so long in my state of hopelessness  I ve kept myself from committing suicide for so long  cant someone just take the reigns for me and catch my mind a break   Mods  if this post is damaging or not okay to say to others  feel free to Thanos Snap it out of existence  I mean that with sincerity  not as some backhanded remark  I am well aware that what I m saying is pretty dumb to say the least  I m just in a horrid spot right now  It s so hard just living in a person that I hate more than anyone  It s hard to just stay
summary: Every day I wake up depressed and I want to kill myself. I don't want to be resilient anymore and I'm tired of being strong. I want someone to hold me and tell me how amazing life is. I hate living in a person that I hate more than anyone.
cleaned: day wake depressed want kill not want resilient anymore tired strong want hold tell amazing life hate live person hate
